metadata.hours_of_work: B - SGEU Field 37.33 - work a total of 37.33 hours/week, averaged over 4 weeks

the_opportunity.intro: The Environmental Protection Branch of the Ministry is seeking multiple versatile professionals with a strong background in engineering or science to join the team as an Environmental Protection Officer. This role supports the delivery of results-based environmental protection programs across Saskatchewan.

qualifications.education_requirements: Typically, the knowledge and abilities required for this position can be achieved through a degree in engineering or science combined with related environmental work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience.

benefits_list: Dynamic, diverse and challenging work for talented individuals;
Vacation, earned days off (EDO) and other types of leave;
Career advancement and development opportunities; and
Flexible work arrangements within branch policies.

additional.diversity_statement: We are committed to workplace diversity.
